data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Ri Bhoi, Meghalaya, India.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ri Bhoi, Meghalaya, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Ri Bhoi, Meghalaya, India.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Ri Bhoi, Meghalaya, India to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Father, encourage your church in Ri Bhoi that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Sabar people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, please raise up prophets in Ri Bhoi who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 2,847 believers in the county of Ri Bhoi into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 2,847 believers in Ri Bhoi that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

location.name: Ri Bhoi
location.people_groups_list: Halam, Koch (Hindu traditions), Hajang, Koch (Muslim traditions), Hajang Banai
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Halam (42,000), Koch (Hindu traditions) (50,000), Hajang (74,000), Koch (Muslim traditions) (400), Hajang Banai (4,900)
